question: You have seen an advertisement for a community college that needs teachers for night classes. Write a letter to the community college. In your letter: say which advertisement you are answering describe which course(s) you want to teach, and what it/they would be about explain why you would be a suitable teacher
text: During the time I was browsing for night classes teacher and I found this opportunity on the net and i would like to apply for this position. Firstly, I have gained a master degree from UBC university in the field of Math, Science and English and also I have got five years of experience as a teacher in one of the best Canadian university.

Secondly, soon after my master , the degree I got  training on how to teach complex students along with few teaching technical methods which can help  students to understand the topic easily. Therefore, I started my career as a faculty and explored  all the ways in the field of Maths and sciences, hence I would strongly say that I am a master in these two subjects. On the other ,hand I am very flexible and able to adapt to any kind of situation immediately.

I hope I am suitable for this given position and I would be happy to provide if any other information is required and looking for your update. I have enclosed my phone number and address in my application please feel free to drop a note if there is any update on my request letter.
